attributes.action: Make late payment after agreed terms in Construction a crime & subject to a fine
attributes.additional_details: It’s affecting the Construction Industry in an extremely negative way, people are losing their livelihoods through no fault of their own & we need to come together to put a stop to it once & for all!
attributes.background: I own a Construction Agency called Lionheart Group and I’ve been on the receiving end of bad/late payers on a number of occasions.
